title: Rammus
body:
Hi, i wanted to take your attention on Rammus{{champion:33}} It's been a long time since I started playing league, and I remember a time (far far away) where he hard a VOICE. You may haven't noticed that, Rito, summoners, but for a long time now the rammus voice, taunt, laugh, joke, are all gone. It may be time to fix this, or is it intended that the only thing Rammus says is "OK" at the champion select? I don't think so.

Ty for taking care of it, and have a nice day :]

replies.body:
Just wondering why Rammus has the whole set of dialogue with taunts and jokes in the French, German, Spanish, Polish and Italian translations.
I mean, I like the little introvert the way he is, but why the change between translations?
I'm not sure if this is an unsuccessful troll or not, but just in case... Rammie has never said anything but "OK" in the English client but he does have actual jokes and taunts in other langauges

Sorry mate, they cant do that. They've already spent the voice actor budget for the next 3 yares on the absurdly long voices that came with the Sion / Karthus updates. They've had to make cuts to the overall length and quality of most voices since then. You can see this in recent updates/releases. The Kass and Ali updates didn't get new voices with their updates (despite being in desperate need of them). Gnar, Rek'Sai and Bard don't have 'traditional' voices just simple noises and some filters. Even the most recent ultimate skin DJ Sona doesn't have a true voice.

BTW that original statement of 'They've already spent the voice actor budget for the next 3 years' is completely falsified. Though you'd be forgiven for believing it given recent trends.
